name: Mission Hiring Hall Inc.
description: Mission Hiring Hall Inc. provides job seekers employment counseling, training, and support service referrals, as well as job readiness training to succeed in job seekers search. Mission Hiring Hall serves low-to-moderate income San Francisco job seekers, ages 18 and up. Services include Spanish, Cantonese, Mandarin, Vietnamese, and Tagalog languages.
